author: Joseph Guzman
title: Sweden could reach 'herd immunity' in weeks, top doctor says | TheHill - The Hill
description:
1. Sweden could reach 'herd immunity' in weeks, top doctor says | TheHill  The Hill

content:
In an effort to curb the spread of the coronavirus outbreak, many countries imposed lockdown restrictions on public life, prompting the closure of schools, restaurants and businesses deemed non essential.
But Sweden did something different.
